title: How Much Term Life Insurance Do I Need? (Hour 2)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Dave Ramsey & Ken Coleman discuss:

How much term life insurance you need,

Avoiding borrowing money for educational training,

Working through financial hardships.
